title: 'Clarity' buffs to Lissandra, Kassadin, Flash users
body:
We all remember the times where we played with a locked camera aye?
Well, if we did that (or held spacebar to temporarily lock camera for as long as we hold the spacebar) and we flashed, the map around us would blink along with wherever your champion flashed/blinked. Champions who have really long ranged blinks has the whole entire map around them just flashing in their face, and it's hard to 're-aim' stuff if you have your camera locked.
I know, just turn off camera lock for when you flash/blink (like Liss and Kass) but like, for those who don't like to unlock camera, why not have a smooth (but still quick enough) shift to where you are after the blink?

Clarity buff :P
I'm not sure if anyone actually understands what I mean :\
